title: Dash Drill
text: Launches the player downward in a high speed burst, tunneling through the ground while ignoring obstacles, then erupting back out with force to continue movement.

title: Camera Transition
text: Manages smooth transitions between the default and special zone cameras, adjusting framing based on player direction and adding shake effects for impact.

title: Ragdoll
text: Replaces defeated enemies with a physics-driven ragdoll, applying random forces for dynamic death animations.

title: Static Turret
text: Implements a stationary enemy that continuously fires projectiles, reacts to player attacks with hit feedback, and transitions into a destroyed state when defeated.
